long_description: The Redpoint 2-sided Hook-and-Loop Strap has a wide variety of uses limited only by your imagination! This self-adhesive, hook-and-loop (rip-and-stick) strap secures to itself to hold anything you need tied or fastened. Use it to lash gear onto your backpack, to lash your lantern to a post, to lash your pump to your bike, to hold an ice pack on an injured area and more.
short_description: The Redpoint 2-sided Hook-and-Loop Strap has a wide variety of uses limited only by your imagination!
